content.question: Which of the following is played?

choices.label: Score A has one staff in the bass clef. There are no key signatures. The score has three measures with the time signature of two four time. unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
